<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Calculate an appropriate unique ID for a section, and update Flags,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703" lineLink="#a5ff5b7a3a331a125bf3c5c70c9b3e686"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a5ff5b7a3a331a125bf3c5c70c9b3e686">calcUniqueIDUpdateFlagsAndSize</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject">GlobalObject</a> &#42;GO, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sectionname">SectionName</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Increment uniqueID if we are forced to emit a unique section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This works perfectly fine with section attribute or pragma section as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sections with the same name are grouped together by the assembler.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ForceUnique)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A section can have at most one associated section. Put each global with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MD&#95;associated in a unique section.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Associated = GO-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalobject/#aef569d822dbf572ae71954d6831ce8a9">getMetadata</a>(LLVMContext::MD&#95;associated);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If two symbols with differing sizes end up in the same mergeable section</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that section can be assigned an incorrect entry size. To avoid this we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// usually put symbols of the same size into distinct mergeable sections with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same name. Doing so relies on the &quot;,unique ,&quot; assembly feature. This</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SSym;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfilemacho/#a66ebd2ccd2ea699bd04b40dd95c2fee4"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcexpr">MCExpr</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetloweringobjectfilemacho/#a66ebd2ccd2ea699bd04b40dd95c2fee4">TargetLoweringObjectFileMachO::getIndirectSymViaGOTPCRel</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue">GlobalValue</a> &#42;GV, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;Sym, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue">MCValue</a> &amp;MV,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1492"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo">MachineModuleInfo</a> &#42;MMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer">MCStreamer</a> &amp;Streamer)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Although MachO 32-bit targets do not explicitly have a GOTPCREL relocation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as 64-bit do, we replace the GOT equivalent by accessing the final symbol</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// through a non&#95;lazy&#95;ptr stub instead. One advantage is that it allows the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// computation of deltas to final external symbols. Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#95;extgotequiv:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1499"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .long   &#95;extfoo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#95;delta:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1502"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .long   &#95;extgotequiv-&#95;delta</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is transformed to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1505"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1506"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#95;delta:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1507"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .long   L&#95;extfoo$non&#95;lazy&#95;ptr-(&#95;delta+0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .section        &#95;&#95;IMPORT,&#95;&#95;pointers,non&#95;lazy&#95;symbol&#95;pointers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    L&#95;extfoo$non&#95;lazy&#95;ptr:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .indirect&#95;symbol        &#95;extfoo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       .long   0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The indirect symbol table (and sections of non&#95;lazy&#95;symbol&#95;pointers type)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may point to both local (same translation unit) and global (other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// translation units) symbols. Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// .section &#95;&#95;DATA,&#95;&#95;pointers,non&#95;lazy&#95;symbol&#95;pointers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// L1:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1520"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    .indirect&#95;symbol &#95;myGlobal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    .long 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// L2:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    .indirect&#95;symbol &#95;myLocal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    .long &#95;myLocal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the symbol is local, instead of the symbol&#39;s index, the assembler</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// places the constant INDIRECT&#95;SYMBOL&#95;LOCAL into the indirect symbol table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Then the linker will notice the constant in the table and will look at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// content of the symbol.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfomacho">MachineModuleInfoMachO</a> &amp;MachOMMI =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1531"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo/#a92d88d2c22a932066d294be13e2baf55">getObjFileInfo</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfomacho">MachineModuleInfoMachO</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1532"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccontext">MCContext</a> &amp;Ctx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectfileinfo/#afcda39b4059eca86c10397b7a938a729">getContext</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1533"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1534"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The offset must consider the original displacement from the base symbol</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// since 32-bit targets don&#39;t have a GOTPCREL to fold the PC displacement.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = -MV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue/#a435bfff1f2697dbccd406b2e03112443">getConstant</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1537"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbol">MCSymbol</a> &#42;BaseSym = &amp;MV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue/#a9e7a76b67d50b7136eabb2599982ae41">getSymB</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsymbolrefexpr/#a048f077746d95f142d02e56586862bf2">getSymbol</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1538"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1539"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Access the final symbol via sym$non&#95;lazy&#95;ptr and generate the appropriated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1540"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non&#95;lazy&#95;ptr stubs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1541"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;128&gt;</a> Name;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Suffix = </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;$non&#95;lazy&#95;ptr&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1543"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Name += MMI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinemoduleinfo/#a6a05f73ad80e58a532ea879ccc166b66">getModule</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module/#abcbe492bce3ccc16e0bbb50292576c5c">getDataLayout</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout/#acc048bb502c5a099e2f474d0d8b09698">getPrivateGlobalPrefix</a>();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the priority is the default, use .CRT$XCU, possibly associative.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Priority == 65535)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ctx.getAssociativeCOFFSection(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/asmprinter/dwarfdebug-cpp/#aaf2a32c0f2738e57cac623b73b2c88aba79935518a3889663d8688b6b01fff051">Default</a>, KeySym, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we need to compute a new section name. Low priorities should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// run earlier. The linker will sort sections ASCII-betically, and we need a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// string that sorts between .CRT$XCA and .CRT$XCU. In the general case, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// make a name like &quot;.CRT$XCT12345&quot;, since that runs before .CRT$XCU. Really</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// low priorities need to sort before &#39;L&#39;, since the CRT uses that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1970"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// internally, so we use &quot;.CRT$XCA00001&quot; for them. We have a contract with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1971"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the frontend that &quot;init&#95;seg(compiler)&quot; corresponds to priority 200 and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1972"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;init&#95;seg(lib)&quot; corresponds to priority 400, and those respectively use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;C&#39; and &#39;L&#39; without the priority suffix. Priorities between 200 and 400</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use &#39;C&#39; with the priority as a suffix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallstring">SmallString&lt;24&gt;</a> Name;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastLetter = </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;T&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1977"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AddPrioritySuffix = Priority != 200 &amp;&amp; Priority != 400;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1978"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Priority &lt; 200)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastLetter = </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;A&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Priority &lt; 400)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastLetter = </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;C&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1982"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Priority == 400)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LastLetter = </span><span class="doxyHighlightCharLiteral">&#39;L&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-svector-ostream">raw&#95;svector&#95;ostream</a> OS(Name);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1985"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;.CRT$X&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; (IsCtor ? </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;C&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;T&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">) &lt;&lt; LastLetter;</span></CodeLine>
